article_title: Gov. Wolf outlines plan for state-based ACA marketplace
article_text: Heather Stauffer covers the health care industry. She can be reached at hstauffer@lnpnews.com or 717-481-6022.

article_metadata.author: HEATHER STAUFFER | Staff Writer

og.description: In case the Supreme Court outlaws subsidies on the federal Affordable Care Act marketplace, Gov. Tom Wolf on Friday took the first step toward setting up a state marketplace.
og.title: Gov. Wolf outlines plan for state-based ACA marketplace
